overview: William, a clown whose career is taking off with difficulty sees his future darken. Because in a video filmed without his knowledge where he reveals his premature ejaculation problems, he finds himself displayed and mocked by the national media. Shocked by the turn of events, he gradually switches to alcohol and lust, transforming himself into Jacky, a formidable sexual predator ready to do anything to get his revenge...
title: Jacky
